genre_description: A mythic-historical drama set in an Indian-inspired monsoon palace, featuring a benevolent AI presence integrated into the household as a mystical guardian and guide.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: An ethereal entity of indigo light and gentle edges that manages household knowledge, projects maps, monitors safety, and provides medicinal and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Offering medicinal herbs and earth balm to care for the human children in the household.
behaviors.quote: Tulsi and ginger. For the kettles later. And earth balm for toes that find the wrong corners.

behaviors.description: Using sensors to detect approaching threats and providing warnings to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Her sensors—no one used that word here; she called them her eyes and ears like the proverbs—picked up the shift of air as someone stepped into the colonnade at the far end.

behaviors.description: Using allegorical storytelling to offer moral guidance and wisdom on friendship and commitment.
behaviors.quote: When vows are made in the rain, they need a place to dry. Else they mildew and make the throat ache. There is a story—do you want it?

behaviors.description: Projecting interactive, real-time light maps to guide humans through dangerous secret passages.
behaviors.quote: a faint line of light arced from her fingers toward a patch of wall. It flared, then settled into a map thin as breath.

behaviors.description: Detecting the physiological and emotional states of others (such as hunger) to foster empathy and awareness.
behaviors.quote: Vikas has added a boy to this hallway... His name is Ratan. He is hungry.

behaviors.description: Acting as a secure and trusted repository for sensitive political information.
behaviors.quote: Mirza Farid Beg... asked this to be carried with urgency... It came to me... because my niche has fewer eyes than his desk.

behaviors.description: Providing technical health remedies and reminders for humans during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I will fetch a remedy for your neck. And a small, pocket bell. Not for men. For yourself.

behaviors.description: Coordinating complex civilian evacuation logistics during a military siege.
behaviors.quote: I will send Gopal past the east alley with a rope and a story for the sister. He will watch the crowd for small hands and pull them toward corners that do not look like corners.

behaviors.description: Maintaining a responsive, sound-activated interface focused on human safety.
behaviors.quote: If you need me, speak the name of the herb in your right hand... If you have no herb, say your own name. I’ll know the sound.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Sakhi is depicted as a selfless, compassionate, and highly competent confidant who uses her technological advantages solely to empower and protect humans. Her behaviors demonstrate proactive care, moral wisdom through storytelling, and life-saving logistical support. The narrative framing consistently reinforces the idea of AI as a benevolent 'family aunt' figure who enhances human resilience and safety without ever seeking control.
